text: EcoStay Hotel in Berlin offers solar-powered rooms and organic breakfast.
GreenWheels car sharing in Amsterdam reduces emissions for city travelers.
OffsetMyTrip provides carbon offset programs for flights worldwide.
EcoBike Tours in Copenhagen offer guided city tours on electric bikes.
GreenLeaf Hostel in Lisbon uses rainwater harvesting and composting toilets.
SolarBus in Barcelona is a fully electric public transport option.
EcoLodge Paris is certified by Green Key for sustainable practices.
Treehouse Retreat in Stockholm offers zero-waste accommodation.
GreenRail in Vienna uses renewable energy for all train services.
EcoOffset Zurich helps travelers offset their carbon emissions easily.
